original_text: And when the jubilee of the people of Israel comes, then their inheritance will be added to the inheritance of the tribe into which they marry, and their inheritance will be taken from the inheritance of the tribe of our fathers.”
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손의 희년을 당하여 그 기업이 그가 속한 지파에 첨가될 것이라 그런즉 그들의 기업은 우리 조상 지파의 기업에서 아주 삭감되리이다

sentences.original_text: And when the jubilee of the people of Israel comes,
then their inheritance will be added
to the inheritance of the tribe into which they marry,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 시집갈 지파의 기업에 더해질 것이며,

sentences.original_text: and their inheritance will be taken
from the inheritance of the tribe of our fathers.”
sentences.korean_translation: 우리 조상의 지파 기업에서 빼앗길 것입니다.
